text: Bridge Zone time continuum as The Path of the Night of the Two Moons. If you perceive these lunar effects in 2017, you will know you have entered the Bridge Zone time continuum. In the Bridge Zone, more open relations with Guardian Visitors will begin, and humanity will continue to evolve along a more enlightened, accelerated path. New fuel sources, such as photonic energy containment, will be discovered as well as many new technologies based upon light, sound and Keylontic science. As the Bridge Zone Earth will receive the infusion of D-5 through D-9 energy during the 2012— 20l7 period, the populations will have the opportunity to assemble the fifth DNA strand to become V oyagers and enter the path of time travel/ascension to Tara.
